locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: War begins while Markus is in Switzerland to liquidate his company. He cannot return to France as he is German.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Germany invades France. Markus registers as a volunteer with the Swiss military authorities.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: The Thurgau police commander proposes that Markus be expelled to Germany.

locations.name: Davesco
locations.description: Sent to a work camp for emigrants. Markus writes to many embassies seeking visas for himself and his family, without success.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Returns to Kreuzlingen with his wife and daughter. The family is penniless and stays with relatives. They are not allowed to work, travel or study and are told they should leave Switzerland as soon as possible.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: The family is threatened with expulsion to Germany, but is allowed to move to Basel Stadt, partly thanks to the VSJF.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: Finally granted permanent residence in Switzerland.
